<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.database_view_calculation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>database_view_calculation</name><script><![CDATA[var database_view_calculation = Class.create();
database_view_calculation.prototype = {
	getRequestedForEmail: function(userId) {
		var needGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		needGR.get(userId);
		return needGR.email;
		
	},
    type: 'database_view_calculation'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mino.v</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-04 10:17:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>41e131c11b31301026c7c841604bcbfe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>database_view_calculation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_41e131c11b31301026c7c841604bcbfe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mino.v</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-04 10:29:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
